This enemy is quite simple but be carefu: This enemy is quite simple but be careful. It may become angry and turn red. Red bullets do double damage!
The enemy that will benchmark the game.
The color of an enemy piece is its phase:
The color of an enemy piece is its phase. Enemy phase has a variety of different effects such as:
Enrage (red) fires extra dangerous bullets.
Petrified (gray) takes reduced damage.
Draining (green) negates damage and heals. Avoid hitting these pieces!
Weak (yellow) takes additional damage. Try hitting these pieces!

You can also look at the enemy's health bar to see their next turn!

Oh my everyone, we got a real genius on: Oh my everyone, we got a real genius on our hands here!
I really need some clarification here! T: I really need some clarification here! Tell me, how did you come up with that answer?
Well, regardless of what you did, you go: Well, regardless of what you did, you got the answer wrong! You truly are as stupid as we all thought you would be! The answer is always C!

Oh deck builder! Just the person I need!: Oh deck builder! Just the person I need!
Some of my books have gone missing!: Some of my books have gone missing!
I usually know where everything in the V: I usually know where everything in the Void is.. I don't know how I could have lost them.
Normally very few things surprise me...
Could you help me find them?: Could you help me find them?
Really? You can't help me out?: Really? You can't help me out?

Thank you for finding my books!: Thank you for finding my books!

As a token of my gratitude I'll let you: As a token of my gratitude I'll let you pick what's on your map.

Deckbuilder! Great to see you again.
I have found an extremely powerful enemy: I have found an extremely powerful enemy. Something that should be much further into the Void..

Okay. It is smart to only take fights yo: Okay. It is smart to only take fights you are prepared for.
A very brave choice. I am sure you will: A very brave choice. I am sure you will be rewarded greatly if you are successful.
